reviews.review: Original Portal 1 provides a super SCI-FI experience.
fun puzzle game, not too hard. it has a cool story, it's pretty cheap, and like i said, very fun.

It's another creation from Valve that has become an instant classic and must have for all gamers.   It's brought a scientific thought game into a playable computer environment.  Neat puzzles and some entertaining humor.   Hmmm, Cake!

This game is amazing and very clever with both the levels and even the dialogue. It's gets really funny the farther you go! And the levels get much more challenging. My only complaints are that it's a bit on the short side and I wish there were more bosses. I can't wait to play the sequel!
Really amazing, one of my favourite steam games, one of my favourite games. It's cheap, fun, modifyable (if that's even a real word) and doesn't require a beefy computer to play!

Bruh, it's Portal. 
If you like video games you owe it too yourself to play this one.
Even if you don't like video games you still have to play it to understand all teh memes.
I could say more but it would've already been said by a couple thousand other people.

Oh! Also: obligatory cake joke.

This is the shortest, but the one of the most amazing games I have ever played!
This is the kind of game you always show people when they come over to your place.

I never bought the hype of Half-Life and Portal and Valve, as a whole because I used to think they were generic FPS games with Aliens and robots and sh¡tt (I was so naive). I was surprised at how uniquely they had achieved to create a universe that they had. It's a perfect blend of real-life and fantasy. I was also impressed at how they managed to tell so much without cut-scenes.

Though this game will take you maximum 2 hours to complete (80 minutes for me) you'll definitely need to play this for the full Portal experience and the masterpiece that is Portal 2.

Thanks for reading my first review ever :)
Hope it helps..
One of the most entertaining and unique puzzle games I have ever played.
Why are you reading this? If you still have issues with this, try the demo!
Divertido e inteligente é um must have para fãs de puzzle.

Игра хорошая, но есть минусы:

По мне так на 4.5\5!

Superbe Jeu. Il est très court si l'ont fait que la trame principal, heuresement des défis sont présent dans le jeu ce qui allonge la durée de vie. La voix de Glados et tout simplement sublime avec une touche d'humour. Je recommande se jeu surtout si vous avez la chance de l'avoir en promo.

Portal review:
Having already heard many good things about portal in the form and video reviews and word of mouth, I can confirm that you will not be disappointed. Portal is a challenging physics based game that shows off in the best possible way. Having said that the game isn't very long, having taken about 3:30 hours to finish it. I wasn't, however left unsatisfied. Portal was a simple yet challenging game that really gave me a sense of achievement having completed it. With the addition of bonus maps there is still plenty of work to be done after the main story line is finished.
The story line itself is intricately with a lot of hidden secrets that's it is completely up to the player to find, adding another level to the game.
All in all a fantastic idea coupled with a fantastic story line.. Making for a fantastic game

My rating:
Length:8/10
Gameplay:10/10
All round enjoyment:10/10

Portal melds satisfying puzzle game-play with some of the best humor in the business to create a short but memorable experience for all. A fantastic antagonist makes up for a completely lacking protagonist. Level design is top notch and graphics last the test of time.

Pros:
Puzzles
Level Design
Graphics
Antagonist 
Humor
Perfect length

Cons:
Cake

В свое время эта игра подняла большой хайп вокруг себя и продвинула кампанию Valve на большой шаг вперед. Подача сюжета интересная,этого отрицать нельзя. Но сам сюжет не затягивает,он скучный и не интересный. Прохождение камер испытания действительно наскучивает,возможно я любитель экшона,но последний час игры просто заставлял себя допройти её. Основная проблема игры - это сюжет. В остальном игра хороша. 6/10.

ドラえもんの道具である「通り抜けフープ」をご存知でしょうか？
それっぽい物を有効に活用するゲームです。
有効に活用する方法を考える時間より、上手く穴を開けるタイミングを覚える時間のほうが長いです。
セールで買うか、誰かに「ちょうだい」とおねだりしましょう。定価で買った人、ご愁傷様です。

In case you can't decide what to play next, try Portal. Even if you don't like it, it's really short, so you can beat it in a day, congratulate yourself on becoming a bit more experienced gamer, and never remember about Portal again. But you'll probably love it. It's amazing, clever and funny and unique. Nice graphics, nice gameplay, great story, great characters. And Portal 2 is even better, just as good, but deeper and bigger.
